privacy.title: policy.privacy.title
data: We only collect the data necessary for the functioning of our application, which uses Google API.
We do not share user data with third parties without their explicit consent.
We use this data only to improve the user experience and the functioning of our application.
We ensure the security of user data and take all measures to protect their confidentiality.
Users have the right to access, modify, and delete their personal data.
We do not collect data on users' personal preferences, political or religious views.
We do not use personal user data for advertising purposes.
We will inform users of any changes to the privacy policy and obtain their consent for these changes.
